about_the_game:
Get a headstart on your Star Sonata experience with 3 months of premium subscription time, 5 unique and Steam exclusive ship skins, and a special holoprojector! Launch into the universe in style!

Subscription benefits include:
  • 25% XP boost to kills
  • 10 extra docked ship slots
  • 1000 extra storage space
  • Wild Space building permit
  • And much more!
detailed_description:
Get a headstart on your Star Sonata experience with 3 months of premium subscription time, 5 unique and Steam exclusive ship skins, and a special holoprojector! Launch into the universe in style!

Subscription benefits include:
  • 25% XP boost to kills
  • 10 extra docked ship slots
  • 1000 extra storage space
  • Wild Space building permit
  • And much more!
name: Star Sonata 2 - Starter Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP
  • Processor: 32bit cpu, dual core 2ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 260 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3570S
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 or equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Launch into Star Sonata 2 with 3 months of premium subscription, 5 cosmetic ship skins, and a holoprojector.
